name: anser
description: A low level parser for ANSI sequences.
author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (http://ionicabizau.net)

ul: Converts text containing [ANSI color escape codes](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code#Colors) into equivalent HTML elements.
Allows converting the input into JSON output.
Friendly APIs to use with  virtual dom libraries

blah.thanks: This project is highly based on [`ansi_up`](https://github.com/drudru/ansi_up), by [@drudru](https://github.com/drudru/). Thanks! :cake:
